Text:
Thank you very much for accepting the list.

And i am so happy that you are doing The naked gun because Hot shots duology & Naked gun trilogy are my all time favourite comedy movies :)
brilliant,just brilliant numbers(u know what i mean).This is the real SHIT... ;)

Did either of you watch this on a larger screen? I know the fact that it's shot on 70's film doesn't help, but could you see a difference from the increased bit rate? Did this 720 have the same quality as the 1080s?

The quality is pretty decent for a 720p in my 21 inch screen !!!

Could you mention your coming uploads ??

And also waiting for THE NAKED GUN :)

As for upcoming releases: The Naked Gun 720p (the last of the low bit-rate 720's without a 1080p source), Jolene 1080p by request, Lolita 576p with extras and (I believe) director's commentary track, 9 Songs 720p (high bit-rate), a decent 480p version of Quills - those are the definites. Possibles include: Lila Says 480p, Clip (Klip) 720p, and The Secretary 720p. And probably one or two unannounced thrown in as well.

i've watched it on 24" screen..it was pretty good..no complain..i think we need someone with a bigger screen to comment,which i don't have atm..but so far as my viewing is concerned it is more than enough for me...considering the availability :)

@Jalucian: I am updating the list of erotic and controversial films and surprised to see Secretary (2002) in your upcoming movie list because it is in my new list too :)

Cheers mate !!!!

Filmsite.org is a pretty good site for starters..
